alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 8:06AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gaines and western Dawson Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 805 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Welch, or 15 miles southeast of Seagraves, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Seminole, Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Gaines County Airport, Welch, Los Ybanez, Loop, Punkin Center, Patricia, Arvana, Hancock, McKenzie Lake, Paynes Corner and Gaines County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
